---
title: "TMF Quality Control (CRA-Relevant)"
---

## Goal
Ensure essential documents are filed in the TMF accurately and on time, and reconcile TMF vs site binder.

## CRA TMF QC Responsibilities (Typical)
- Confirm filing of approvals, ICF versions, key correspondence (as required)
- Identify gaps and drive resolution (with documented follow-up)
- Reconcile discrepancies between site binder and TMF

## TMF Reconciliation Checklist
- [ ] Protocol/ICF versions match between TMF and site
- [ ] IRB approval letters present for each version used
- [ ] Delegation logs and training evidence filed per plan
- [ ] Site staff CV/licensure present if required
- [ ] Audit trail: follow-up requests documented and closed
